You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesN N] > &nu;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Nu;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/039d/index.htm U+0039D].
  * `&nu;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03bd/index.htm U+003BD].
